dao

Class LinkTPKeyWordDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • dao.DAO<LinkTPKeyWord>
      • dao.LinkTPKeyWordDAO

  • public class LinkTPKeyWordDAO
extends DAO<LinkTPKeyWord>
    Version:
    1 this is the Dao class for LinkTPKeyWord database table. This table creates link between a keyword, and a type profile. This class allows to create, delete, update or find an link in the data base
    Author:
    Ilies
